content:
COPY for Collections (cont’d)

  • Depth header of “infinity”

    • Collection must propagate COPY to all internal members
    • If Overwrite is “true” the COPY method duplicates all external members in a new collection at the Destination
    • If Overwrite is “false” and the destination is a collection, COPY does not duplicate external members, but is propagated to all internal members.

Previous slide Next slide Back to first slide View graphic version
